attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I knew something was up when the lord fell from the sky to tell, “Ziz is noT oTay.” I still proceed to download the app and it gave me a virus. NOT CORONA VIRUS. But a phone virus 💁🏽‍♀️ so with that remove ze app.

attributes.review: i downloaded the app expecting a fantastic campaign app and a new way to stay in touch with the countries youth. what i actually got was a crappy app that had no real purpose and was just a waste of time and icloud space🧚‍♀️✨i would much rather use that space for crossy road and subway surfer😡🐞sorry, not sorry👁👄👁🤍
